meanings.definition: A Russian carriage with a hood and a seat for passengers.
meanings.sent1: The droskies rattled along the cobblestone streets.
meanings.sent2: We took a ride in the droskies to explore the city.
meanings.sent3: The droskies looked like a cozy little house on wheels.
meanings.sent4: The droskies glided through the snow like a graceful swan.
meanings.sent5: The colorful droskies added a touch of old-world charm to the town.

meanings.sent1: The market was filled with various droskies for sale.
meanings.sent2: The droskies lined up neatly in the carriage yard.
meanings.sent3: The droskies seemed to be having a little race of their own.
meanings.sent4: The droskies stood out in the crowd like bright flowers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the droskies clattering echoed through the village.
